text: Ballochia rotundifolia is a species of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Socotra. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Socotra rotundifolia Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Ballochia rotundifolia
